title: ‎PicAI Image&Avatar Generator on the App Store
keywords: PicAI Image&Avatar Generator, 北京翠鹿商务服务有限公司, Graphics & Design, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes
introduction: AI Portrait offers users quick and engaging AI avatars by generating personalized scenes in about 20 seconds. It provides eight preset image styles, including front-facing portraits, oil paintings, comics, and ID photos.
features: Quick and engaging AI avatars generation
Fully personalized scenes based on input details

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate an AI portrait?
faqs.answer: AI Portrait can generate any desired scene's AI portrait in about 20 seconds.

faqs.question: What are the available image styles in AI Portrait?
faqs.answer: AI Portrait offers eight preset image styles, including front-facing portraits, oil paintings, comics, and ID photos.

targetPeople: Users looking for quick and personalized AI avatars
